keyFacts: Lesley Groff and Amanda Kirby are coordinating a meeting with Jeffrey Epstein.
The meeting was initially scheduled for a Friday lunch but was canceled.
Two potential dates for rescheduling the meeting are October 14 and October 22, 2013.
Paul is mentioned as having communicated with Jeffrey Epstein regarding the meeting.
